name: Virtual Distributed Database Management

screenshots.caption: Screenshot of Database Tables in PHP

short_description: VDDBMS is a middleware for managing data sources (DBMS) from different vendors to form a virtual DDBMS. It supports fragmentation and replication. The core engine is written in C++. Binding for scripting language is available as well as network access.
